text: William Slocum may refer to: *William J. Slocum (1884–1943), American sports writer (also known as Bill Slocum) *William Slocum Groesbeck (1815–1897), American politician *William F. Slocum (1851–1934), American educator, president of Colorado College *Bill Slocum (born 1947), American politician (born as William L. Slocum) ==See also== *Slocum (disambiguation) *William Slocumb (1810–1865), physician and political figure in Nova Scotia, Canada
title: William Slocum
